name: Brain Run
description:
Help your brain to avoid emotional damage and informational insanity overflow!

What kind of emotion do you feel when you read hoaxes? When you hear some weird theory, that.... might be true!? Are you also so tired up when you have to delete never ending sea of spam? So is your brain. 

Try really hard and discover ultimate final conspiracy boss.

Controls: 
  • Right/Left Arrow - Move
  • Space - Jump
Warning:

Contains picture of naked Nicolas Cage. And some other disturbing imagery.

Personal dev notes:

Kal_Hel

When we were discussing the ideas for the game, I had in mind mostly how much I don´t like the topic. I thought how much I´m fed up with all of this informational fluff, that keeps spamming my mind every waking hour. And then this theme, the topic of how destructive emotional impact of hoaxes, fake news and ubiquitous informational bombing  can be for our brain and our soul. It may seem strange, but during work on this game I thought mostly on Plato and Jan Patocka and the greek concept of to deinon as something, that is disturbing your peace, threatening your safety and your feeling of home in this world.  And disinformation, hoaxes, and conspiration theories are definitely deinos.

We also wanted to add some personal tips, what we like to do to feel better, but we didn´t have time for that - so at least here - my stress relievers:

  • Driving a bike while yelling "Lucretia My Reflection" by The Sister of Mercy
  • Homemade spirit my grandpa made
  • Weird dancing when I finally made something work
